name: Artillery Globe - Open Beta
description:
Open Beta test version for Artillery Globe

The Open Beta time period will be 2019 Jan 25th to 28th.

Claim the entirety of the planet with real-time missile based combat. Build structures and new technology to strategically take control of all the planets resources. 

Build Surveillance : Intercept radio signals to gain an edge on you opponent.
Defend Your cause : Build force fields to protect yourself from enemy onslaught.
Control The sky : Launch satellites to take gain tactial information of the planet. 
Break any Defence : Execute strategically timed attacks to overwhelm your opponent.
Build ultimate weapons : Take control of resources to build doomsday weapons.
